snippet.title: Astor: Blade of the Monolith - Official Release Date Trailer | ID@Xbox April 2024
snippet.description: Explore a colorful, dangerous planet and see gameplay in this release date trailer for Astor: Blade of the Monolith, an upcoming fast-paced action RPG coming to Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S on May 30, 2024. Astor: Blade of the Monolith will also be available on PC, PlayStation 4, and PlayStation 5. In Astor: Blade of the Monolith, rip through hordes of enemies with fury and style. Play as Astor, a young warrior determined to unveil the secrets behind his creators’ unforeseen demise. Wield an arsenal of runic weapons to hunt down the evil haunting the planet Gliese and save it from impending doom.
